SEARCH

Class UserControllerTest

java.lang.Object
UserControllerTest
class UserControllerTest extends Object
Comprehensive JUnit test suite for the UserController class.

This class utilizes Java Reflection to access private fields and methods, ensuring high code coverage. It also manages the JavaFX Application Thread to safely test UI components without launching the full application.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Zainab

  • Constructor Details

    • UserControllerTest

      UserControllerTest()

  • Method Details

    • initJfx

      @BeforeAll static void initJfx()
      Initializes the JavaFX runtime environment. This prevents IllegalStateException when accessing JavaFX components.

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp() throws Exception
      Sets up the test environment before each test execution. Creates a temporary data file, initializes the controller, injects the test file path, and injects mock UI controls.
      Throws:
      Exception - if any initialization step fails.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach void tearDown()
      Cleans up the test environment after each test execution. Deletes the temporary data file.

    • injectTestFilePath

      private void injectTestFilePath()
      Attempts to inject the test file path into the controller by guessing common field names. This ensures the controller reads the temporary test file instead of the production file.

    • testInitializationAndLoading

      @Test void testInitializationAndLoading()
      Verifies that the controller initializes correctly and loads data into the table.

    • testUserContextUpdates

      @Test void testUserContextUpdates() throws InterruptedException
      Tests that updating the current user context updates the UI labels correctly. Also verifies legacy setter methods.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the JavaFX thread is interrupted.

    • testBorrowFlow

      @Test void testBorrowFlow() throws InterruptedException
      Tests the complete book borrowing workflow. Covers successful borrowing, attempting to borrow an already borrowed item, and attempting to borrow without a selection.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the JavaFX thread is interrupted.

    • testBorrowWithFinesBlocker

      @Test void testBorrowWithFinesBlocker() throws InterruptedException
      Verifies that a user cannot borrow a new book if they have existing unpaid fines.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the JavaFX thread is interrupted.

    • testReturnFlow

      @Test void testReturnFlow() throws InterruptedException
      Tests the book return workflow. Covers successful return and attempting to return an item borrowed by another user.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the JavaFX thread is interrupted.

    • testReturnWithFineBlocks

      @Test void testReturnWithFineBlocks() throws InterruptedException
      Verifies that returning an overdue book with a fine is blocked until payment is made.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the JavaFX thread is interrupted.

    • testPaymentFlow

      @Test void testPaymentFlow() throws InterruptedException
      Tests the fine payment workflow, including partial payments and full payments.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the JavaFX thread is interrupted.

    • testPaymentValidation

      @Test void testPaymentValidation() throws InterruptedException
      Tests validation logic for the payment input field. Checks for negative numbers, invalid strings, and overpayment.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the JavaFX thread is interrupted.

    • testReloadAndLogout

      @Test void testReloadAndLogout() throws InterruptedException
      Tests the functionality of reloading data from file and handling logout.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the JavaFX thread is interrupted.

    • testReflectionHelpers

      @Test void testReflectionHelpers() throws Exception
      Tests private helper methods within the controller using Reflection. This ensures coverage for internal parsing logic that is not directly exposed.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection access fails.

    • selectRow

      private void selectRow(int index)
      Selects a row in the TableView on the JavaFX thread.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the row to select.

    • runAndWait

      private void runAndWait(Runnable action) throws InterruptedException
      Executes a Runnable on the JavaFX Application Thread and waits for it to complete.
      Parameters:
      action - The action to execute.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting.

    • getField

      private <T> T getField(String name)
      Retrieves the value of a private field from the controller using Reflection.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of the field.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the field.
      Returns:
      The value of the field.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the field cannot be accessed.

    • injectMockControls

      private void injectMockControls() throws Exception
      Injects mock JavaFX controls into the controller to prevent NPEs during testing.
      Throws:
      Exception - if field injection fails.

    • setField

      private void setField(String name, Object val) throws Exception
      Sets the value of a private field in the controller using Reflection.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the field.
      val - The value to set.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the field cannot be accessed.

    • createDataFile

      private void createDataFile() throws IOException
      Creates a temporary CSV file with test data.
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file cannot be written.
